title: 2018 Christmas history quiz
itunes:title: 2018 Christmas history quiz
itunes:subtitle: Join the BBC History Magazine team for the return of our annual Christmas history quiz with questions set by QI writer Justin Pollard. Read the text version at: www.historyextra.com/christmasquiz2018
description:
Join the BBC History Magazine team for the return of our annual Christmas history quiz with questions set by QI writer Justin Pollard. Read the text version at: www.historyextra.com/christmasquiz2018

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
